name: Promote an ordinary user to a site administrator
description: Note that you'll need to set `Content-Length` to zero when calling out to this endpoint. For more information, see "[HTTP verbs](/v3/#http-verbs)."

name: Demote a site administrator to an ordinary user
description: You can demote any user account except your own.

name: Suspend a user
description:
If your GitHub Enterprise appliance has [LDAP Sync with Active Directory LDAP servers](https://help.github.com/enterprise/admin/guides/user-management/using-ldap), this API is disabled and will return a `403` response. Users managed by an external account cannot be suspended via the API.

You can suspend any user account except your own.

Note that you'll need to set `Content-Length` to zero when calling out to this endpoint. For more information, see "[HTTP verbs](/v3/#http-verbs)."

name: Unsuspend a user
description: If your GitHub Enterprise appliance has [LDAP Sync with Active Directory LDAP servers](https://help.github.com/enterprise/admin/guides/user-management/using-ldap), this API is disabled and will return a `403` response. Users managed by an external account cannot be unsuspended via the API.
